Goal Representation:
['1. Find the spectacles and put them on the coffee table in the home office.', '2. Find the book an
d put it on the coffee table in the home office.']

behavior find_spectacles_and_place_on_coffee_table(spectacles:item, table:item, office:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(spectacles) # Temporarily pick up the spectacles
        achieve inside(table, office) # Ensure the table is in the home office
        achieve on(spectacles, table) # Place the spectacles on the coffee table

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind spectacles: item where:
            is_spectacles(spectacles)
        # Select the spectacles

        bind table: item where:
            is_coffee_table(table)
        # Select the coffee table

        bind office: item where:
            is_home_office(office)
        # Select the home office

        find_spectacles_and_place_on_coffee_table(spectacles, table, office)
